text: kesemayi wihani awerede፡፡ shelek’owochumi bemet’enachewi fesesu፡፡ gorifumi asefafiwini korefati teshekeme፡፡ leget’i weyimi le‘ik’a filagoti be’irisu layi isati yemiyanedubetimi (ma‘idini) bit’ewi yehone korefati alilewi፡፡ inidezihu alahi le’iwinetina lewisheti misaleni yaderigali፡፡ korefatuma gibisibisi hono yit’efali፡፡ lesewochi yemit’ek’imewima bemidiri layi yik’oyali፡፡ inidezihu alahi misalewochini yigelits’ali፡፡
